name: Grab 'em Dice
description:
This is made for GMTK jam 2022

The goal is to find and collect all the dice on the moving platform. 

Score is calculated for total top face of the dice on the platform. 

- - Controls - -

WASD to move

Spacebar to Jump ( double tap for double jump)

Left Shift to dash

Hold left click to grab

Release left click to release
